name: Mount Burnmore
description:
Mount Burnmore is a puzzle game for Apple Watch that transforms your active energy into game energy!

> The best Apple Watch apps we've used in 2019 – TechRadar
> “Now, this is the sort of thing that takes advantage of Apple Watch’s capabilities in a fun, interesting, and potentially-beneficial way!” – Mac Daily News
> “Love the Concept” – Apple WatchCast Review
> Blends Wearable Tech with Gamification
> Solve Challenging Puzzles
> Win Useful Game Items

***About Mount Burnmore***
Mount Burnmore is a unique game that transforms your active energy (your calories burned as registered by your Apple Watch Activity App) into game energy, which you use to rotate blocks that clear a route to the top of a mountain. The more active energy you generate, the more game energy you’ll have to play!

***Challenging & Fun***
Collect flags and unlock new mountains to climb. There are also daily challenges to win useful game items, like a pickaxe to smash away blocks.

***You’ll Love Mount Burnmore!***
People around the world love how Mount Burnmore uniquely blends state-of-the-art wearable technology, with fun and exciting gamification. You’ll get fit as you have fun!

***Safe & Secure***
Mount Burnmore integrates the Apple Watch Activity App to access your active energy data. This is only done with your permission. We never share your data with any third party, or use it for any other purpose than to play the game.
